          <title>
            <string language="sl">Starejši brat</string>
            <string language="en">Older brother</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Älterer Bruder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un frère plus âgé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irmão mais velho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fratello più anziano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλαιότερος αδελφός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un más viejo hermano</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Na podlagi zgodbice razmišljamo o odnosih v družini.</string>
            <string language="en">The story of a family and consideration of a relations that are present.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družina</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odnosi</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">starši</string>
            <string language="en">parents</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geschichte einer Familie und der Erwägung 
von Relationen, die anwesend sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'histoire d'une famille et d'une considération 
d'relations qui sont présentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A história de uma família e de uma 
consideração do relações que estão atuais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La storia di una famiglia e di una considerazione
dell'rapporti che sono presenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία μιας οικογένειας και μιας εκτίμησης σχέσεις 
που είναι παρούσες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La historia de una familia y de una 
consideración del relaciones que están presentes.</string>
          </description>
